item.title: Dune 2024
item.description: My boys loved the two Dune movies by Denis Villeneuve. We saw the second one in 70mm IMAX at the Chinese theater in Hollywood on our family vacation. Quite the spectacle. I’m impressed they understood the conflict of the main hero, Paul, and his struggle with accepting his destiny. Once they realized this was only the beginning of a much longer story, they were inspired to read the book. I wonder if this will be the spark that ignites their desire to read more.
